thread.title: Triple H, Shawn Michaels, Mickie James, And More React To WWE And TNA Entering Multi-Year Partnership
thread.title_full: Triple H, Shawn Michaels, Mickie James, And More React To WWE And TNA Entering Multi-Year Partnership

author: Robert DeFelice
title: Triple H, Shawn Michaels, Mickie James, And More React To WWE And TNA Entering Multi-Year Partnership
text:
The wrestling world reacts to a groundbreaking day for TNA Wrestling as they enter a working relationship with WWE.
TNA Wrestling and WWE announced on January 16 that they have entered a multi-year agreement that will see them exchange talent between NXT and the TNA roster.
Matt Hardy, Mickie James, Shawn Michaels, Triple H, and more have all commented on the agreement via social media. Read some of the reactions from around the world wrestling below:
Massive news for everyone.
— Triple H (@TripleH)[@WWE],[@ThisIsTNA], and, most importantly, fans around the world. This valuable partnership will help prepare both companies for the next generation of this industry.[https://t.co/xUSAlAnGW3][January 16, 2025]
Oooooh… I like this. ----
— Mickie James~Aldis (@MickieJames)[https://t.co/BiUXm6juYA][January 16, 2025]
This is awesome. 2025 is gonna be wild.
— Death Machine (@TheSamiCallihan)[https://t.co/Ks56NWxIhv][pic.twitter.com/53bUCzVwIX][January 16, 2025]
— Trinity (@TheTrinity_Fatu)[January 16, 2025]
The next evolution of an unprecedented partnership.
— Shawn Michaels (@ShawnMichaels)
Excited for our continued collaboration with[@ThisIsTNA]and the invaluable opportunities it presents for the development of the[#WWENXT]Superstars & TNA Wrestling Stars.[https://t.co/KpJtxHgsfD][January 16, 2025]
— MOOSE (@TheMooseNation)[January 16, 2025]
The possibilities…
— Nathan Frazer (@WWEFrazer)[https://t.co/gJigPcvUzM][January 16, 2025]
Hey
— Brian Myers (@Myers_Wrestling)[@FinnBalor]are we still gonna ride together?!?![https://t.co/mxsmjxbn5b][January 16, 2025]
Am I going to
— Xia Brookside ザイヤ・ブルックサイド (@XiaBrookside)[@WWENXT]-- ?![https://t.co/9JfNRMsgo8][January 16, 2025]
X Division
— PRIME Alexander (@CedricAlexander)[https://t.co/qpgZFIm2KX][January 16, 2025]
I guess I should pack an extra clothesline for Dallas next week.
— John Layfield (@JCLayfield)[https://t.co/XJNJO9yIWZ][January 16, 2025]
This is so cool
— Nattie (@NatbyNature)[https://t.co/NCh8v1mn1P][January 16, 2025]
I’ve done some growing up since the last time I was in a WWE ring--
— Dani Luna (@DaniLuna_pro)[https://t.co/ES5IWtbq2N][pic.twitter.com/uLNiCEbaRc][January 16, 2025]
— MATT HARDY (@MATTHARDYBRAND)
[https://t.co/tWsqdaJW6K][pic.twitter.com/DplcDcxvdZ][January 16, 2025]
So I’m basically the ex-boyfriend that she took back right before Thanksgiving… --
— A.J. FRANCI$ -- (@AJFrancis410)[https://t.co/mcNeeZMPac][pic.twitter.com/uwnhITYeKI][January 16, 2025]
Hmmmm.
— BIG BRONSON REED (@BRONSONISHERE)[https://t.co/z2E164le8w][https://t.co/yfjeAuENwB][January 16, 2025]
Find out more details about the partnership at this link.
TNA has also begun advertising NXT as part of the upcoming TNA Genesis pay-per-view. Fans can check out the full card for that event here.
